name: Void Karma
description:
This was a submission to Godot Wild Jam 54 - CURSES
https://itch.io/jam/godot-wild-jam-54

This, has been our most exhausting game jam so far. The two of us are both Amateur Game-Designers, but we learned a lot from this. Multiple redirections and pivots occurred during production. There were a LOT of unpolished elements, but we still gave it out best. We finished exporting the project minutes ago, and the deadline is 35 minutes away. Hope you enjoy our game!

Controls can be found within the Game Help Screen.
